game.description: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple, hidden deep within the Darkforest.
game.objective: Find and retrieve the Starlight Crystal.
game.quest_giver: Eilif Stonefist, the elderly dwarf scholar at Oakwood Inn.
game.reward: A set of Mastercrafted Boots granting increased movement speed and resistance to elemental effects.

tasks.description: Reach the entrance of the lost temple, guarded by two packs of fierce Shadow Wolves.
tasks.objective: Clear the area around the temple entrance.

tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous maze within the temple and find the first puzzle chamber.
tasks.objective: Solve the pressure plate puzzle to unlock the door.

tasks.description: Defeat the guardian of the Starlight Crystal, a fearsome Fire Elemental.
tasks.objective: Engage and defeat the elemental in combat.

game.title: The Lost Temple of the Ancients
